example_string._description: The _description property gives context to the translator as to how the string is used in the product

localization_explanation.message: SKY UX Builder provides the capability to declare localization strings in a JSON file and then reference those strings throughout your SPA using the skyAppResources pipe or the SkyAppResourcesService service in @blackbaud/skyux-builder/runtime/i18n. For full reference see the SKY UX docs
localization_explanation._description: Information on localizing text within the a Stache SPA.
